did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, Level 1, Shelf 23-B.
did.abstract: This collection contains her scrapbook, a notebook, and a book of her original poetry. The scrapbook (or Memory Book) contains newspaper clippings, memorabalia, letters, programs from college events, photographs, and other items depicting student life at Radford in 1931-32. A finding aid is available for this collection.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. Collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.The binding on the original scrapbook was in very poor condition, so the individual pages have been removed and placed in numbered folders,reflecting the original order.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item] Vinnie Alice Underwood Collection, Radford Heritage Collection, Radford University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University, Radford, VA. Vinnie Alice Underwood Collection , Accession # SC 201.01, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Patricia Cosby Crawford, the daughter of Vinnie Alice Underwood.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was a gift to the Radford University Archives from Patricia Cosby Crawford, the daughter of Vinnie Alice Underwood.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Vinnie Alice Underwood attended State Teachers' College at Radford from 1931-32.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains her scrapbook, a notebook, and a book of her original poetry. The scrapbook (or Memory Book) contains newspaper clippings, memorabalia, letters, programs from college events, photographs, and other items depicting student life at Radford in 1931-32.

blockquote.p: The binding on the original scrapbook was in very poor condition, so the individual pages have been removed and placed in numbered folders, reflecting the original order.
Box 1: Contents of scrapbook with individual pages in file folders
Box 2: Two handwritten books of poetry by Vinnie Underwood
